Question: This person was often noted for her shyness while growing up, but she did take an interest in both music and dancing.
Hints: This person also had an infant brother, John, who died only a year before she was born.
This person also excelled in swimming and diving, and longed to be a professional ballerina with the Royal Ballet.
Lady **** was well received by the Queen, the Duke of Edinburgh, and Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother.
